metadata.title: CVE-2024-53908 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential SQL injection in HasKey(lhs, rhs) on Oracle

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-53908` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 3:4.2.15-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3:4.2.15-1ubuntu1.1').
